1403110.name: Primeval
1403110.description:
Experience the life of 65+ prehistoric creatures from various parts of the ecosystem.Â  Play as the plant eating herbivores, the meat-eating carnivores, and the fish-eating piscivores.

Roam the land, seas, and skies.Â  Â Eat, grow, and survive in an unforgiving world filled with many creatures that can hunt you or be hunted.

Earn evolution points as you play by eating, killing, and completing tasks.Â  Â Use those points to customize your creature's talents, traits, and attributes and adapt to your surroundings and challenges.

Collect a hoard of items that can be used to strengthen your creatures, nests, and eggs.

Once mature, creatures can build a nest and spawn eggs that can hatch into their very own brood.Â  You can also empower the eggs you'll spawn with items that you store in your nest inventory.

ğŸ”¹67 playable species include:

Ankylosaurus, Archelon, Brachiosaurus, Compsognathus, Dilophosaurus, Dimetrodon, Oviraptor, Parasaurolophus, Pteranodon, Sarcosuchus, Spinosaurus, Stegosaurus, Triceratops, Tryannosaurus, Velociraptor, Argentinosaurus, Baryonyx, Carnotaurus, Gallimimus, Iguanodon, Kentrosaurus, Ouranosaurus, Pachycephalosaurus, Protoceratops, Styracosaurus, Troodon, Dimorphodon, Quetzalcoatlus, Ammonite, Anomalocaris, Cameroceras, Dunkleosteus, Elasmosaurus, Helicoprion, Ophthalmosaurus, Leedsichthys, Megalodon, Tylosaurus, Onchopristis, Xenacanthus, Meganeura, Titanoboa, Trilobite, Skorpiovenator, Suchomimus, Diplocaulus, Edmontosaurus, Padillasaurus, Kryptops, Giganotosaurus, Daspletosaurus, Ceratosaurus, Allosaurus, Inostrancevia, Gorgosaurus, Albertosaurus, Thalassodromeus, Dryosaurus, Acrocanthosaurus, Therizinosaurus, and Deinonychus, Deinosuchus, Deinocheirus, and Gigantoraptor.

ğŸ”¹Just like the creatures you play, this game is ever-growing and improving.

ğŸ”¹Created by a single indie developer.

ğŸ”¹Multiplayer with PVP and AI is planned for a future update.
